vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PrivateBank.cashOut (patch_4.sol#18-24):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_4.sol#20-23)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_4.sol#21)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: newMsg in Log.addMessage (patch_4.sol#40) is a local variable never initialiazed
